body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth         Kids of all ages can become a junior ranger at Tonto National Monument! J Smith/NPS Photo  Tonto National Monument is not just for adults, it's for kids and teens too!  There are many ways to have fun while you visit the monument-  Become a Junior Ranger  Become a Scout Ranger Don't forget to check out our calendar of events, we might have a special event coming up that you don't want to miss!        Exchange your voucher for an Interagency Annual 4th Grade Pass at the visitor center    Calling all 4th Graders- You are invited to participate in the Every Kid in a Park program!  If you are a US 4th grader (including home-schooled and free choice learners 10 years of age) you can download your own voucher to gain unlimited, free access to any federal lands of waters for a year! Visit the Every Kid in a Park webpage for more information.
title: Tonto National Monument: Kids & Youth
